item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 12/2016
item.description: Including: Andy Frasco & The U.N., Connan Mockasin, Hound Dog Taylor, Jeff Martin, Jimi Hendrix, Joe Marson, Little Barrie, Snowy White, The Bonnevilles, The J. Geils Band.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 11/2016
item.description: Including: Alvin Lee, Black Pistol Fire, Deap Vally, Disaster Boots, Graveyard, John Paul Jones, Keith﻿ Richards, The Black Keys, The Damned And Dirty, The Rolling Stones.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 10/2016
item.description: Including: All Them Witches, Black Dog Howl, Gary Clark Jr., Kaleo, Life'S Electric, New American, Seth Canan & The Carriers, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Tedeschi Trucks Band, Winstons.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 9/2016
item.description: Including: Bo Diddley Live 1973, Captain Beefheart, Climax Chicago Blues Band, Gary Clark Jr., Graveyard, John Mayer, Robert Cray, The Big Nose Attack, The Shouting Matches, White Stripes.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 8/2016
item.description: Including: A Thing From The South, Be With Me, Chris Smither, Cracker, Joe Bonamassa, Joe Louis Walker, Louis Berry, Smoke Stack Rhino, The Bone Shop, ジョニー・ウィンター Johnny Winter.

item.description: Including: Benjamin Booker, Black Pistol Fire, Dire Straits, Honkeyfinger, Ian Thornley, Led Zeppelin, Mountain Dust, R.L. Burnside, Rival Sons, Tom Waits.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 6/2016
item.description: Including: Blues Pills, Brother Dege, Dirty Deep, Electric Spoonful, Graveyard Train, Left Lane Cruiser, Murdering Tripping Blues, Ransom Pier, The Greasy Slicks, The White Stripes.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 5/2016
item.description: Including: Black Cat Bone, Black Lung, Captain Beefheart, Coming Down The Mountain, Electric Spoonful, Groundhogs, King Mud, Lair Of The Swamp Witch, River Bottom, Sulfur Giant.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 4/2016
item.description: Including: Aint Got No Blues, All Them Witches, Endless Boogie, Gary Clark Jr., Magic Sam, R.L. Burnside, Rory Gallagher, Bad Penny, Samantha Fish, Smak, The Doors.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 3/2016
item.description: Including: Frustrating Sound, Graveyard, Jack White, Joe Bonamassa, Little Hurricane, Pristine, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Tedeschi Trucks Band, The Greasy Slicks, The Raconteurs.
